column2: Dash seems to trully trust your abilities...
Seiki, before you leave, I have something more to ask.
We drew up a plan to definitivly stop the Selvos. But I fear that our technician, Tekuno, has been captured by the enemy.
He was suppose to open the door leading to the tree canopy, where the Selvos installed the tower's heart.
If you find and free him while searching your siblings, I will feel beholden.
I wish you luck young fox, and may the great zenchi tree be with you.
